title: Luxurious Marrakesh All-Suite Retreat in Sprawling Parklands with Daily Breakfast
description:
Set amidst two hectares of lush, palm-lined parklands, this expansive five-star oasis offers a unique sense of tranquillity, while still being just minutes away from the lively heart of Marrakesh. In this luxurious sanctuary, every moment is a sensory delight, offering indulgences that rival the vibrant city streets.

Relax by the sparkling infinity pool or wander through gardens of century-old olive trees, roses, and palms. Enjoy gourmet dining at two elegant onsite restaurants and revitalise at the world-class spa, featuring an authentic hammam.

With a convenient shuttle service to the city centre, Domaine des Remparts Hotel & Spa provides seamless access to Morocco's vibrant culture, from its charming labyrinth of narrow streets and historic walls to its breathtaking landscapes and grand mosques.
offer_address: KM4 route de Fes vers Tallaght, Marrakech, Palmeraie 40000, Morocco

title: Award-Winning Marrakech Private Pool Villa Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Unveil Morocco’s legendary myth and magic with an opulent villa stay at this five-star oasis, perfectly positioned in dazzling Marrakech. As you wander through spellbinding gardens of fragrant citrus trees, ancient olive groves and whispering fountains, it’s easy to see why The Oberoi Marrakech is so acclaimed.

Embark on a journey through India’s culinary heritage at Rivayat, dine in the shadow of the Atlas Mountains at Tamimt or savour champagne and crudites at Vue, complete with candlelit interiors and a cosy open-air terrace. Located atop a shimmering water feature within the orchards, The Oberoi Spa beckons with a Moroccan hammam, herbal therapies and indulgent rituals.

Beyond the resort's walls, Marrakech is a treasure chest stuffed to the brim with hidden wonders - explore the cactus-fringed walkways of Yves Saint Laurent’s Jardin Majorelle, stand in the majesty of Bahia Palace or head to the buzzing Medina for a glimpse of the city's electric spirit.

title: Africa's #1 Hotel: The Oberoi Marrakech Private Pool Villas with Guaranteed Room Upgrade, Dining Credit & Airport Transfers
description:
Discover Morocco’s legendary myth and magic with a vibrant villa stay at The Oberoi Marrakech, a five-star luxury oasis in one of the country’s most dazzling cities. As you wander through spellbinding gardens of fragrant citrus trees, ancient olive groves and whispering fountains, it’s easy to see why The Oberoi Marrakech was crowned Travel + Leisure's top Resort in Africa and the Middle East in the 2023 World's Best Awards - with no detail overlooked, every feature has been meticulously curated to put you at ease. Embark on a culinary journey through India’s rich culinary heritage at Rivayat, dine in the shadow of the mighty Atlas Mountains at Tamimt or savour champagne and crudites at Vue.

Marrakech is a treasure chest stuffed to the brim with hidden wonders - explore the cactus-fringed walkways of Yves Saint Laurent’s Jardin Majorelle gardens, stand in the majesty of Bahia Palace or head to Djemaa el Fna, the city’s main square, for a glimpse of the city’s electric spirit.

title: Five-Star Marrakech All-Suite Retreat near Atlas Mountains with Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description: Between the lush gardens and dazzling souks of Marrakech and the mighty Atlas Mountains, this stylish all-suite stay offers an oasis of luxury in the serene heart of the desert. With Marrakech city centre, Agafay Desert and the lake town of Lalla Takerkoust all within a 30-minute drive, Sumahan Suites and Spa Marrakech offers the perfect place to retreat after days spent exploring the region’s natural wonders. Return to classic cocktails - best enjoyed by the hotel’s spectacular central pool - or scrubbing rituals and hammam treatments at the onsite spa.
offer_address: Km 20 Route d'Amizmiz, Douad Akrich, Marrakech 40000, Morocco

title: Glamorous Morocco All-Suite Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Bask in the opulence of Moorish architecture and medieval charms at this palatial Marrakech abode, perfectly located near the iconic Medina. Surrounded by manicured gardens, the luxury all-suite oasis offers stunning views of the Atlas Mountains and boasts a mosaic pool, tranquil nooks and traditional decor.

Savour chef-prepared authentic Moroccan cuisine at the onsite restaurant, and pamper yourself with relaxing hammam rituals and massages at the wellness spa. If you're looking to explore, the vibrant souks of the Medina, brimming with exotic spices and textiles, and the historic Bahia Palace await.
offer_address: Lot N°1, Commune Tassoultante, Km 10 Route de l'Ourika Cercle Loudaya, Marrakech 40000, Morocco

title: Marrakech Traditional Hideaway in Palm-Lined Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Buffet Dinner
description:
Retreat to paradise beneath the hundred-thousand swaying palms of Marrakech's ornate Palmeraie with a stay at this five-star oasis. Set at the edge of the city, Barceló Palmeraie Oasis Resort feels worlds away, yet the souks and spice-scented medinas are only minutes down the road.

Here, days unfold between swims beneath the Moroccan sun, slow sips at the poolside L’Oasis Bar and sensory rituals at its wellness centre. Steep in a steaming hammam, soothe sore muscles with a massage, find your balance and book in a yoga class or practice your putt at the onsite mini-golf course.

Mornings begin with buffet breakfasts on the terrace at L'Oliveraie, while evenings end with spiced lamb and platters at Mezze, or live music and a cocktail at the Art Deco-inspired Le Bar Ambiance. When you're not lounging beside one of two sparkling pools, step out to explore the best of Marrakech - wander the colourful alleys of the medina or visit the gorgeous Jardin Majorelle and the Yves Saint Laurent Museum.
offer_address: KM6, Route de Fès, Marrakech 40600, Morocco

title: Five-Star Palatial Marrakech Opulence with Deluxe Spa & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the fusion of Moroccan charms and Arabo-Moorish architecture at this grandiose five-star hotel, perfectly positioned near the erstwhile imperial city's Medina. Facing the mythic ramparts and royal gardens of Agdal, this palatial address sits like a jewel amid 10 acres of lush greenery, brimming with citrus groves, tiled mosaic pathways and Andalusian fountains.

Decked in deep Moroccan hues, the property boasts an exquisite blend of traditional and impressionist-style decor inside and out. Dine alfresco and indulge in delectable cuisine at La terasse de l'Insensé, taste an array of Moroccan flavours in Saoussane restaurant and sip on expertly-made cocktails at L’Orientaliste lounge bar overlooking the shimmering pool and the Atlas Mountains.

For a spot of relaxation, take a dip in one of the hotel's pools or unwind with an oriental treatment at O-Spa by Kenzi. Should you wish to explore, the city's vibrant Medina and enchanting Jardin Majorelle are only moments away.
offer_address: Zone de l’Agdal, Avenue Mohamed VI, Marrakech 40000, Morocco

title: Authentic Marrakech Escape Moments from Jemaa el-Fnaa Square with Daily Breakfast
description:
A harmonious blend of Moroccan tradition and modern luxury can be experienced at this tranquil oasis in the heart of Marrakech. Just a stone's throw from the vibrant Jemaa el-Fnaa Square, this boutique retreat offers an authentic Moroccan experience. Indulge in a traditional hammam at the onsite spa or savour local flavours at the rooftop Beldi Fusion Kitchen Médina restaurant.

Enjoy the culture and vibrancy of the city while exploring the labyrinthine souks nearby. For a tryst with history, the Majorelle Garden and Bahia Palace are within easy reach. If you are looking for insider stories, embark on an adventure with guided tours of the Medina and Agafay desert (extra charges apply).
offer_address: Rue El Moustachfa, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco

title: Boutique Marrakech Hideaway in the Heart of the Medina with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the enchanting allure of Morocco with a stay at this boutique hideaway within the walls of the famous Marrakech Medina. Get a taste of authentic Moroccan culture at this charming retreat, adorned with colourful mosaic tiles, intricate patterns and verdant plants. Typical of a Morrocan riad, the traditional inner courtyard featuring an oasis-like pool takes centre stage and makes for the perfect setting to unwind in between sight-seeing.

Kick-start your day with a delightful breakfast before setting out to explore the nearby Jardin Majorelle or the winding streets and bustling souks of the Medina. After a day of discovery, retreat to the hotel's tranquil spa for a traditional Argan oil massage, or savour authentic Moroccan delicacies at the onsite restaurant.
location_description: Riad Samir Privilege Boutique Hotel & Spa
offer_address: Rue Azbezt, Ben Saleh, Medina, Marrakech 40000, Morocco

title: Five-Star Marrakech Villas & Suites near the Medina with Four Restaurants & Bars
description: Set among 20 hectares of fragrant gardens, framed by the breathtaking Atlas Mountains of Morocco, is the Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech, a stunning property composed of luxurious villas and suites. Just a 10-minute drive from the Medina of Marrakech, with its cobblestoned lanes, bustling marketplace and aromatic street food vendors, the vibrant culture of Morocco is right on your doorstep. At the hotel, you'll find a luxurious spa with two Moroccan hammams, offering an authentic insight into the local culture. Or, take yourself on an exquisite journey into gastronomy: feast on modern Cantonese at Ling Ling by Hakkasan, snack at the Pool Garden restaurant, or taste an array of flavours with dishes featuring Mediterranean, North African and Oriental influences at Shirvan.

title: Marrakech Luxury with Morocco's Largest Pool, Seven Dining Venues & Golf Course
description:
Experience the splendour of Marrakech with an opulent Fairmont stay at this five-star oasis, perfectly positioned amid the ancient olive groves of a 231-hectare estate. With the majestic Atlas Mountains as your backdrop, this tranquil retreat offers a world-class golf course, a 2,000sqm swimming pool and four exquisite restaurants serving an array of international and Moroccan cuisine.

Delve into the local culture with a visit to the vibrant Medina, just a 20-minute drive away, or explore the enchanting Majorelle Garden, home to rare botanical species. Back at the resort, rejuvenate at the expansive spa, offering traditional Hammam rituals and invigorating wellness treatments that will leave you utterly relaxed.
offer_address: Km 12 Route D Amizmiz, Marrakech 40000, Morocco

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Marrakech Palace Retreat
description:
Unravel the storied wonders of centuries-old ksars, glittering mosaics and labyrinthine bazaars while staying at Selman Marrakech. Situated at the foot of the Atlas Mountains, emerging from the sands just outside the city walls, this timeless terracotta palace blends ancient traditions with modern luxury. In less than 20 minutes' drive, you can reach the must-see sights of this vibrant Moroccan city, including the market stalls at Jemaa el-Fna, the gardens of Jardin Majorelle and ornate 19th-century Bahia Palace.

Skillfully designed by French architect Jacques Garcia, Selman Marrakech was crafted using Moroccan architectural techniques. Its unique beauty has secured a ranking among the top 1% of hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor, with a prestigious 2020 Travellers' Choice Best of the Best award as one of the top 25 hotels in Africa. In this timeless setting, every moment is magnified by contemporary facilities, including three restaurants (each with its own culinary identity: authentic Moroccan, international and Mediterranean), two bars, the glamorous Espace Vitalité Chenot spa (one of just six in the world), an outdoor pool, sprawling garden, and a working stud farm with privately owned Arabian thoroughbreds.
